desc.en: trinity old church corridor daytime sunlight gold yellow
desc.jp: trinity old church corridor daytime sunlight gold yellow

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_cn: 由于和{cn风纪委员会}的{cf亚子}交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。{cn对策委员会}决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的{cn风纪委员会}。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_cn: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长{cf阳奈}现身，针对此状况责问{cf亚子}。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.zh_cn: 老师突然将视线与{cf遥香}的对上了。{cf遥香}对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}首先为{cn风纪委员会}发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望{cn对策委员会}将{cn便利屋68}的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。{cf绫音}据理力争，而{cf亚子}则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有{et夏莱}的老师站在你们这边吧”。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sensei expresses their opinions on Problem Solver 68, thinking that they aren't intentional. Most of the Foreclosure Task Force agree, but says it is still impossible to transfer for the identity of their backgrounds remained unknown.
desc.jp: Sensei expresses their opinions on Problem Solver 68, thinking that they aren't intentional. Most of the Foreclosure Task Force agree, but says it is still impossible to transfer for the identity of their backgrounds remained unknown.
desc.zh_cn: 老师表示了自己对便利屋的看法，认为他们不是故意的。{cn对策委员会}的大多数也同意，但表示因为还没找到幕后黑手，所以不能轻易交给{sn格黑娜}。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.jp: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.zh_cn: 谈判破裂，{cf亚子}打算继续攻击。然而{cn对策委员会}突然受到{cf遥香}的攻击，同时{cf佳世子}也开始逐步拆穿{cf亚子}的骗局：带大量兵力来{sn其他}自治区闹事绝非{cf阳奈}所为，实际上是{cf亚子}自己出兵；目标实际上是{et夏莱}，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，{cn风纪委员会}担心{et夏莱}这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于{sn三一}的{cf日步美}将内容给了{cn茶会}，而{cn茶会}的情报又被{sn格黑娜}拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在{sn格黑娜}，顺带处理{cn便利屋68}。

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.jp: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.zh_cn: {cf佳世子}希望{cf亚瑠}尽快离开，但{cf亚瑠}不仅表示要战斗到底，{sn阿拜多斯}一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，{cf亚子}正式下达了战斗命令。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force cautiously heads toward the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force cautiously heads toward the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}小心翼翼地前往{sn阿拜多斯}沙漠。

desc.en: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.
desc.jp: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.
desc.zh_cn: 众人到达了沙漠边缘。由于电车无法继续前行，众人开始徒步前往。{cf茜香}对为什么是{cn风纪委员会}长告诉老师的，而{cf绫音}则回顾了当时的情况。

desc.en: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.
desc.jp: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.
desc.zh_cn: {cf绫音}指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。{cf野乃美}突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。

name.zh_cn: 即使如此也未曾放弃的事物（1）

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.zh_cn: {cf日步美}与{sn三一}学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的{cn对策委员会}一行人面前。{cn对策委员会}趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。

desc.en: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.jp: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达{sn阿拜多斯}高中旧本馆的{cn对策委员会}一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的{cf亚瑠}和{cn便利屋68}一行人即时出现帮助{cn对策委员会}。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。{cf日步美}此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与{sn三一}毫无关联。通讯结束后，{cn对策委员会}几人开始突破。

desc.en: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.
desc.jp: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.
desc.zh_cn: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经{sn阿拜多斯}学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时{cn便利屋68}全员赶到，开始支援。{cn对策委员会}将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找{cf星野}。

desc.en: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.jp: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.zh_cn: {cf绿}和{cf桃井}想在废墟找到，记载着制作出最佳游戏的秘诀的圣经<G.Bible>，不料却被一群敌对机器人追赶，因而逃往废弃工厂。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori started their adventure while dodging the weird robots. Momoi talked about some things about the ruins and told Sensei what G.BIBLE truly is - a game-making tutorial book written by one ancient legendary game maker. As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori started their adventure while dodging the weird robots. Momoi talked about some things about the ruins and told Sensei what G.BIBLE truly is - a game-making tutorial book written by one ancient legendary game maker. As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}与{cf绿}开始在废墟里探险，三人共同躲避着奇怪的机器人。期间{cf桃井}稍微讲了一些关于废墟的事情，向老师说明了《G.BIBLE》为何——一本由以前的传奇制作人写下的游戏制作书籍。就在众人在聊的欢时，他们被机器人发现，{cf桃井}随后决定前往附近的一所废弃工厂回避。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，{cf爱丽丝}。{cf桃井}为了阻止{cn游戏开发部}被废社，于是便把{cf爱丽丝}带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_cn: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的{cf爱丽丝}，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。{cf绿}可怜{cf爱丽丝}，便决定将她带回{sn千年}，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，{cf爱丽丝}因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.jp: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}将{cf爱丽丝}带回到社团活动室，{cf绿}非常惊诧。{cf爱丽丝}因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。{cf桃井}随后说出了自己的计划：她想让{cf爱丽丝}伪装成{sn千年}的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.jp: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.zh_cn: 这次和上次不同，由于{cf爱丽丝}的大展身手，{cn游戏开发部}轻松打倒了废墟的机器人后，朝向目的地前进。

desc.en: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.jp: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。{cf绿}提出撤退，但被{cf桃井}否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在{cf爱丽丝}与{cf桃井}的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。{cf爱丽丝}在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_cn: 众人到达了工厂，但{cf爱丽丝}却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着{cf爱丽丝}，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.jp: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.zh_cn: 电脑认出了{cf爱丽丝}，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，{cf桃井}献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；{cf桃井}大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.jp: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}去见{cn研讨会}的部长{cf莉音}。两人在谈论先前{cn游戏开发部}与{cnC&C}发生的事，并且针对{cf爱丽丝}的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于{cf爱丽丝}立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来{cf阳葵}遭到某人的袭击。

desc.en: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.jp: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}与{cf阳葵}秘密会见，开始了对当前情况的梳理。

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.jp: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}和{cf阳葵}共同策划了{cn游戏开发部}与{cnC&C}的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了{cf爱丽丝}的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，{cf莉音}认为{cf爱丽丝}是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而{cf阳葵}则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。

desc.en: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.jp: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}固守着自己的结论，与{cf莉音}产生了严重分歧。{cf莉音}试图用AMAS将{cf阳葵}困住，但{cf阳葵}轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

desc.en: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.jp: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着{cf莉音}的固执。然而这时{cf阳葵}却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位{cnC&C}成员——所牢牢控制住。

desc.en: 聯邦學生會觀測到了6個並不存在於奇普託斯的上空的能量體。琳為了解決問題，召集了各個自治區的學生會代表，並且成立了緊急對策委員會。
desc.jp: 聯邦學生會觀測到了6個並不存在於奇普託斯的上空的能量體。琳為了解決問題，召集了各個自治區的學生會代表，並且成立了緊急對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn: 联邦学生会观测到了6个并不存在于奇普托斯的上空的能量体。{cf琳}为了解决问题，召集了各个自治区的学生会代表，并且成立了紧急{cn对策委员会}。

desc.en: 琳陷入回憶中，記起了她與會長爭辯“琳醬”叫法的事情。
desc.jp: 琳陷入回憶中，記起了她與會長爭辯“琳醬”叫法的事情。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}陷入回忆中，记起了她与会长争辩“{cf琳}酱”叫法的事情。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 步來到琳的辦公室，向她報告桃香不久前發現的緊急情況。
desc.jp: 步來到琳的辦公室，向她報告桃香不久前發現的緊急情況。
desc.zh_cn: {cf步}来到{cf琳}的办公室，向她报告{cf桃香}不久前发现的紧急情况。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 控制室裡，桃香向琳展示了資料。
desc.jp: 控制室裡，桃香向琳展示了資料。
desc.zh_cn: 控制室里，{cf桃香}向{cf琳}展示了数据。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: 桃香指出，兩小時前，在基沃託斯各地觀測到了數個能量濃度極高的能量體――尤其是，在聖所之塔正中央，他們所處的地方，也有一個，但沒人能目視觀察到它。桃香主張是感測器故障，但琳不這麼認為。
desc.jp: 桃香指出，兩小時前，在基沃託斯各地觀測到了數個能量濃度極高的能量體――尤其是，在聖所之塔正中央，他們所處的地方，也有一個，但沒人能目視觀察到它。桃香主張是感測器故障，但琳不這麼認為。
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃香}指出，两小时前，在基沃托斯各地观测到了数个能量浓度极高的能量体――尤其是，在圣所之塔正中央，他们所处的地方，也有一个，但没人能目视观察到它。{cf桃香}主张是传感器故障，但{cf琳}不这么认为。

She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 琳確認現在發生緊急情況，要求召集各地區的學生會代表，共同商討應對方案。她將以代理會長的許可權發動緊急協議，成立基沃託斯緊急對策委員會。
desc.jp: 琳確認現在發生緊急情況，要求召集各地區的學生會代表，共同商討應對方案。她將以代理會長的許可權發動緊急協議，成立基沃託斯緊急對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}确认现在发生紧急情况，要求召集各地区的学生会代表，共同商讨应对方案。她将以代理会长的权限发动紧急协议，成立基沃托斯紧急{cn对策委员会}。

desc.en: 步擔心琳這一次可能更加激發學生們對琳的代理會長許可權濫用的聲討，尤其是這可能侵犯了防衛室的許可權。琳執意繼續釋出，就在這時財務室的碧來到控制室。
desc.jp: 步擔心琳這一次可能更加激發學生們對琳的代理會長許可權濫用的聲討，尤其是這可能侵犯了防衛室的許可權。琳執意繼續釋出，就在這時財務室的碧來到控制室。
desc.zh_cn: {cf步}担心{cf琳}这一次可能更加激发学生们对{cf琳}的代理会长权限滥用的声讨，尤其是这可能侵犯了防卫室的权限。{cf琳}执意继续发布，就在这时财务室的{cf碧}来到控制室。

desc.en: 碧指責琳在擔任代理會長期間的各種出格事情，例如關閉SRT和接受“夏萊”這一組織，指出她已經濫權。碧警告稱，如果琳無法給出有說服力的證據，她可能會把琳冠以“試圖私有化聯邦學生會”的罪名，並希望她再三考量。碧隨後離開。
desc.jp: 碧指責琳在擔任代理會長期間的各種出格事情，例如關閉SRT和接受“夏萊”這一組織，指出她已經濫權。碧警告稱，如果琳無法給出有說服力的證據，她可能會把琳冠以“試圖私有化聯邦學生會”的罪名，並希望她再三考量。碧隨後離開。
desc.zh_cn: {cf碧}指责{cf琳}在担任代理会长期间的各种出格事情，例如关闭{snSRT}和接受“{et夏莱}”这一组织，指出她已经滥权。{cf碧}警告称，如果{cf琳}无法给出有说服力的证据，她可能会把{cf琳}冠以“试图私有化联邦学生会”的罪名，并希望她再三考量。{cf碧}随后离开。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 琳來到控制室外，遇到防衛室部長香耶。香耶表示自己無心插手事情，並認為琳有許可權發起緊急對策委員會。香耶同時建議琳把夏萊的力量加入其中，琳接受了建議。香耶主動幫助接送老師，表示將安排女武神進行。
desc.jp: 琳來到控制室外，遇到防衛室部長香耶。香耶表示自己無心插手事情，並認為琳有許可權發起緊急對策委員會。香耶同時建議琳把夏萊的力量加入其中，琳接受了建議。香耶主動幫助接送老師，表示將安排女武神進行。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}来到控制室外，遇到防卫室部长{cf香耶}。{cf香耶}表示自己无心插手事情，并认为{cf琳}有权限发起紧急{cn对策委员会}。{cf香耶}同时建议{cf琳}把{et夏莱}的力量加入其中，{cf琳}接受了建议。{cf香耶}主动帮助接送老师，表示将安排{sn女武神}进行。

desc.en: 主要成員集合的學園附近大致上已經整頓好了，但小春在遺蹟地帶附近陷入苦戰當中。茶會的彌香突然登場，讓戰況開始出現了逆轉。
desc.jp: 主要成員集合的學園附近大致上已經整頓好了，但小春在遺蹟地帶附近陷入苦戰當中。茶會的彌香突然登場，讓戰況開始出現了逆轉。
desc.zh_cn: 主要成员集合的学园附近大致上已经整顿好了，但{cf小春}在遗迹地带附近陷入苦战当中。{cn茶会}的{cf弥香}突然登场，让战况开始出现了逆转。

desc.en: 小春等實現正義部的成員都向彌香道謝。
desc.jp: 小春等實現正義部的成員都向彌香道謝。
desc.zh_cn: {cf小春}等{cn实现正义部}的成员都向{cf弥香}道谢。

desc.en: 雖然一邊已經打完了戰鬥，但聖亞感覺到教堂附近還有人沒有撤離。蓮實讓麻白確認情況，果真如此。
desc.jp: 雖然一邊已經打完了戰鬥，但聖亞感覺到教堂附近還有人沒有撤離。蓮實讓麻白確認情況，果真如此。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然一边已经打完了战斗，但{cf圣亚}感觉到教堂附近还有人没有撤离。{cf莲实}让{cf麻白}确认情况，果真如此。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 除了第六個聖所之外，其他聖所的守護者攻略都已經準備好，所有自治區也完成了防禦準備，就在此時，夏萊附近出現了大量的無名守護者。就在千鈞一髮之際，意外的幫手出現協助防禦夏萊。
desc.jp: 除了第六個聖所之外，其他聖所的守護者攻略都已經準備好，所有自治區也完成了防禦準備，就在此時，夏萊附近出現了大量的無名守護者。就在千鈞一髮之際，意外的幫手出現協助防禦夏萊。

desc.en: 所有自治區的防禦作戰、以及聖所守護者的攻略都準備就緒了，作戰即將開始。
desc.jp: 所有自治區的防禦作戰、以及聖所守護者的攻略都準備就緒了，作戰即將開始。
desc.zh_cn: 所有自治区的防御作战、以及圣所守护者的攻略都准备就绪了，作战即将开始。

desc.en: 艦長琳被特意準備了一個大衣。陽葵表示這些服裝經過改造後，不僅實現了生理監測，同時還具備防火之類的功能。雖然有些人對這套服裝仍頗有微詞，不過琳很快平息衝突，進入正題。
desc.jp: 艦長琳被特意準備了一個大衣。陽葵表示這些服裝經過改造後，不僅實現了生理監測，同時還具備防火之類的功能。雖然有些人對這套服裝仍頗有微詞，不過琳很快平息衝突，進入正題。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

name.en: 美食研究會與風華同學
name.jp: 美食研究會與風華同學

desc.en: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.jp: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}宣布{cf风华}同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有{cn美食研究会}。{cf风华}对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但{cn美食研究会}解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对{cf风华}而言并没有什么吸引力。{cf亚伽里}同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把{cn供给部}的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 老師想起來與黑服的對話，其中黑服表示強行啟動戰艦將可能導致老師的肉體受到損害。
desc.jp: 老師想起來與黑服的對話，其中黑服表示強行啟動戰艦將可能導致老師的肉體受到損害。
desc.zh_cn: 老师想起来与黑服的对话，其中黑服表示强行启动战舰将可能导致老师的肉体受到损害。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 黑服在與老師的交流中提到，即便老師這麼去做了，命運的歸宿最終仍會讓基沃託斯到達終結，就像白子那一般。黑服無法理解老師為何在一個命運已經決定的世界裡奮力掙扎到這種地步。
desc.jp: 黑服在與老師的交流中提到，即便老師這麼去做了，命運的歸宿最終仍會讓基沃託斯到達終結，就像白子那一般。黑服無法理解老師為何在一個命運已經決定的世界裡奮力掙扎到這種地步。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服在与老师的交流中提到，即便老师这么去做了，命运的归宿最终仍会让基沃托斯到达终结，就像{cf白子}那一般。黑服无法理解老师为何在一个命运已经决定的世界里奋力挣扎到这种地步。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 黑服追問老師他是否是真的會不惜一切代價，老師堅定的回答了“是”。
desc.jp: 黑服追問老師他是否是真的會不惜一切代價，老師堅定的回答了“是”。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服追问老师他是否是真的会不惜一切代价，老师坚定的回答了“是”。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 老師內心做著激烈的鬥爭，琳把老師拉回現實。老師詢問琳當時是如何回答會長關於“第二項古則”的問題的――更準確的來說，琳是如何填空的。
desc.jp: 老師內心做著激烈的鬥爭，琳把老師拉回現實。老師詢問琳當時是如何回答會長關於“第二項古則”的問題的――更準確的來說，琳是如何填空的。
desc.zh_cn: 老师内心做着激烈的斗争，{cf琳}把老师拉回现实。老师询问{cf琳}当时是如何回答会长关于“第二项古则”的问题的――更准确的来说，{cf琳}是如何填空的。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 會長相信，琳與她之間無法互相理解、無法觸及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一種天意。會長很喜歡琳完成的句子：透過無法理解的他人（事物），是否能夠理解自己（彼此）呢？
desc.jp: 會長相信，琳與她之間無法互相理解、無法觸及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一種天意。會長很喜歡琳完成的句子：透過無法理解的他人（事物），是否能夠理解自己（彼此）呢？
desc.zh_cn: 会长相信，{cf琳}与她之间无法互相理解、无法触及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一种天意。会长很喜欢{cf琳}完成的句子：通过无法理解的他人（事物），是否能够理解自己（彼此）呢？

desc.en: 利用箱子的力量，老師成功啟動了戰艦，一切都在按照手冊和計劃上的執行著。老師下令戰艦正式啟航，綾音報告戰艦準備離地。
desc.jp: 利用箱子的力量，老師成功啟動了戰艦，一切都在按照手冊和計劃上的執行著。老師下令戰艦正式啟航，綾音報告戰艦準備離地。
desc.zh_cn: 利用箱子的力量，老师成功启动了战舰，一切都在按照手册和计划上的执行着。老师下令战舰正式启航，{cf绫音}报告战舰准备离地。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 正好三千留成功將妖怪劇團逼到絕境，但是她猶豫著只是被逼著過來的自己還能做些什麼。於是知道伊吹一直在等待忍術研究部的事實的三千留，果敢地衝上前，救出了伊吹。
desc.jp: 正好三千留成功將妖怪劇團逼到絕境，但是她猶豫著只是被逼著過來的自己還能做些什麼。於是知道伊吹一直在等待忍術研究部的事實的三千留，果敢地衝上前，救出了伊吹。
desc.zh_cn: 正好{cf三千留}成功将妖怪剧团逼到绝境，但是她犹豫着只是被逼着过来的自己还能做些什么。于是知道伊吹一直在等待{cn忍术研究部}的事实的{cf三千留}，果敢地冲上前，救出了伊吹。

desc.en:
為了成為正式的社團，忍術研究部決定協助百鬼夜行和格黑娜的交流會。
然而這兩所學園的交流會想必無法風平浪靜地結束……
面對眼前各式各樣的問題，少女們得出的答案究竟會是什麼呢！？
desc.jp:
為了成為正式的社團，忍術研究部決定協助百鬼夜行和格黑娜的交流會。
然而這兩所學園的交流會想必無法風平浪靜地結束……
面對眼前各式各樣的問題，少女們得出的答案究竟會是什麼呢！？
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: 等待著前往和頭盔團進行最後之戰的一行人是，過去將阿拜多斯逼近絕境的凱薩理事本人。目前負責章魚銀行營業職員的凱薩理事，即使向靜子提案了新投資也被拒絕。就這樣向著靜子襲來的頭盔團以及新人的泳裝蒙面團……！百鬼夜行和阿拜多斯漫長的夏天，最後之戰即刻開始！
desc.jp: 等待著前往和頭盔團進行最後之戰的一行人是，過去將阿拜多斯逼近絕境的凱薩理事本人。目前負責章魚銀行營業職員的凱薩理事，即使向靜子提案了新投資也被拒絕。就這樣向著靜子襲來的頭盔團以及新人的泳裝蒙面團……！百鬼夜行和阿拜多斯漫長的夏天，最後之戰即刻開始！
desc.zh_cn: 等待着前往和头盔团进行最后之战的一行人是，过去将{sn阿拜多斯}逼近绝境的凯萨理事本人。目前负责章鱼银行营业职员的凯萨理事，即使向{cf静子}提案了新投资也被拒绝。就这样向着{cf静子}袭来的头盔团以及新人的泳装蒙面团……！{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn阿拜多斯}漫长的夏天，最后之战即刻开始！

desc.en:
為了開啟新的事業「海之家」，百夜堂一行人來到了渡假勝地。
然而等待著他們的卻是渡假勝地之間的權利爭奪「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟靜子能否順利守護「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂嶄新的戰鬥，即刻開始。
desc.jp:
為了開啟新的事業「海之家」，百夜堂一行人來到了渡假勝地。
然而等待著他們的卻是渡假勝地之間的權利爭奪「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟靜子能否順利守護「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂嶄新的戰鬥，即刻開始。
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 對策委員會一行人對白子逃走感到很不開心，不過星野表示，既然白子要來妨礙老師破壞方舟，那麼他們只需要繼續破壞，讓她繼續出現即可――到時也不難。
desc.jp: 對策委員會一行人對白子逃走感到很不開心，不過星野表示，既然白子要來妨礙老師破壞方舟，那麼他們只需要繼續破壞，讓她繼續出現即可――到時也不難。
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人对{cf白子}逃走感到很不开心，不过{cf星野}表示，既然{cf白子}要来妨碍老师破坏方舟，那么他们只需要继续破坏，让她继续出现即可――到时也不难。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 成功突入方舟後，「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占領戰」正式開始。與次元引擎及其守護者展開的激戰──究竟，在這場戰鬥的盡頭等待著的會是什麼呢……？

desc.en: 外圍3區次元引擎被破壞，白子再次撤退了。優香駭入中央地區後連線通訊，把在中央地區發現戴著面具的白子的事實轉達給大家。為了救出白子，老師和學生們準備迎接最後的一場戰役。
desc.jp: 外圍3區次元引擎被破壞，白子再次撤退了。優香駭入中央地區後連線通訊，把在中央地區發現戴著面具的白子的事實轉達給大家。為了救出白子，老師和學生們準備迎接最後的一場戰役。
desc.zh_cn: 外围3区次元引擎被破坏，{cf白子}再次撤退了。{cf优香}骇入中央地区后连接通信，把在中央地区发现戴着面具的{cf白子}的事实转达给大家。为了救出{cf白子}，老师和学生们准备迎接最后的一场战役。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 眾人聯絡上了真正的白子。白子解釋稱自己是在騎車路上被綁架的，起初還以為他們是為了要贖金，所以就戴上了面罩。星野督促白子取下，並重申了她之前的話。眾人要白子在那裡乖乖等候，他們馬上就到。白子答應，眾人立刻出發。
desc.jp: 眾人聯絡上了真正的白子。白子解釋稱自己是在騎車路上被綁架的，起初還以為他們是為了要贖金，所以就戴上了面罩。星野督促白子取下，並重申了她之前的話。眾人要白子在那裡乖乖等候，他們馬上就到。白子答應，眾人立刻出發。
desc.zh_cn: 众人联系上了真正的{cf白子}。{cf白子}解释称自己是在骑车路上被绑架的，起初还以为他们是为了要赎金，所以就戴上了面罩。{cf星野}督促{cf白子}取下，并重申了她之前的话。众人要{cf白子}在那里乖乖等候，他们马上就到。{cf白子}答应，众人立刻出发。

desc.en: 中央區――也就是第四區域，是方舟的最後一個區域。陽葵指出，白子被關押的地方由特殊安全系統保護，其因與外界隔離無法駭入。對策委員會主動承擔了破壞的任務。
desc.jp: 中央區――也就是第四區域，是方舟的最後一個區域。陽葵指出，白子被關押的地方由特殊安全系統保護，其因與外界隔離無法駭入。對策委員會主動承擔了破壞的任務。
desc.zh_cn: 中央区――也就是第四区域，是方舟的最后一个区域。{cf阳葵}指出，{cf白子}被关押的地方由特殊安全系统保护，其因与外界隔离无法骇入。{cn对策委员会}主动承担了破坏的任务。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

hobby.en: Serving and charming customers, Idol Punch
hobby.jp: 可愛く接客すること、看板娘パンチ
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 可爱地接待客人、看板娘拳

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Umika is a student studying at Hyakkiyako, a member of the Festival Management Committee.
desc.jp: Umika is a student studying at Hyakkiyako, a member of the Festival Management Committee.
desc.zh_cn: 海花是一名百鬼夜行的学生，节庆营运管理部的一名成员。
